settings.content: The thumbnails settings effects both the product and collections thumbs.

settings.label: Product pagination limit
settings.info: The maximum amount of thumbs you can show on a page is 50. For best results use a multiple of your thumbs column count.

settings.label: Nested collection product limit
settings.info: This is only applied to collections with the template of 'nested-products' and will limit each nested collections product length. The maximum is 50.

settings.content: The 'Crop', 'Ratio' & 'Alignment' settings will only be used if 'Constrain images to the same size' is enabled.

settings.label: Constrain images to the same size
settings.info: Use this if you have uploaded different sized images across your products and want them to look consistent

settings.label: Crop images to fit thumbnail container
settings.info: If left unchecked images will be scaled to fit inside their thumbnail container

settings.label: Thumbnail ratio
settings.info: Options are either 'square', 'landscape', 'portrait', or a ratio written in the format 'w:h' (i.e. 1:1 would be sqaure, 4:6 would be portrait)
